BREAST-COMPOSITION: The breast tissue in this mammogram image appears to be heterogeneous, exhibiting both fatty and dense areas.
FINDINGS: There is a round, well-circumscribed opacity with regular margins, measuring approximately 10mm in diameter, located in the upper outer quadrant of the left breast. This finding suggests a benign lesion such as a fibroadenaoma. Short-term follow-up imaging is recommended to confirm stability.
